alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:14PM CDT until July 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Medicine Lake, or 29 miles south of Martin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Merriman, Medicine Lake, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Indian Hill, Schoolhouse Lake and Eli. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 131 and 154. Highway 61 between mile markers 210 and 231. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
